Cooking
■Open the platen
and take out the
teriyaki patties
from the grill-
side freezer.

Cooking
■Put the patties
on the grill from
front to back,
left to right.

Cooking
■Close the platen
and prepare a
UHC tray with a
clean liner.

Cooking
■When the platen
opens, remove the
patties from
front to back and
put them on tray.

Cooking
■Put them in the
UHC and press
the timer.

Cooking
■Store the patties
so that the
temperature is at
least 60°C/140°F.

Cooking
■Clean the grill
and press the
standby switch to
close the platen.
